document.full_text: after american commandos killed osama bin laden in pakistan on monday and flew away with his body, they left behind at least two surviving family members of the qaeda leader: a wife and a daughter.
document.title: the lede: left behind: bin laden's wife and daughter
lines_and_colors: after american commandos killed osama bin laden in pakistan on monday and flew away with his body, they left behind at least two surviving family members of the qaeda leader: a wife and a daughter.
